ajax-comments/ajax-comments.js.php

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 <?php
00002 
00008 require('../../../wp-config.php'); // invoke WordPress bootstrap
00009 
00010 header('Content-Type: text/javascript'); ?>
00011 var ajax_comments = {
00012   locked: [],
00013 
00014   onsubmit: function() {
00015     var form = this;
00016     if (ajax_comments.locked[form]) { return false; } // one at a time
00017     else { ajax_comments.locked[form] = true; } // lock this form
00018 
00019     jQuery.ajax({
00020       type: 'POST',
00021       url: '<?php print AJAX_COMMENTS_URL ?>/ajax-comments-post.php',
00022       data: jQuery(this).formSerialize(),
00023       dataType: 'json',
00024       cache: false,
00025       timeout: 60000,
00026 
00027       beforeSend: function(XMLHttpRequest) {
00028         jQuery('.ajax_comments_error', form).remove(); // remove any previous errors
00029         jQuery('input[@type=submit]', form) // select form submit button
00030           .attr('disabled', 'disabled') // disable it
00031           .hide() // hide it
00032           .after('<div class="ajax_comments_spinner" title="<?php print htmlspecialchars(__('Submitting your comment...')) ?>" style="background:url(<?php print AJAX_COMMENTS_URL ?>/ajax-comments-spinner.gif);width:220px;height:19px;text-indent:-9999px;font-size:0;line-height:0;"><?php print htmlspecialchars(__('Submitting...')) ?></div>'); // show AJAX spinner
00033       },
00034 
00035       success: function(data, textStatus) {
00036         if ( // validate server response
00037           typeof(data.comment_type) == 'undefined' ||
00038           typeof(data.comment_ID) == 'undefined' ||
00039           typeof(data.comments_template) == 'undefined' ||
00040           !data.comments_template
00041         ) { // if response is not as expected...
00042           this.error({responseText:''}, '', ''); // display unknown error
00043           return; // abort
00044         }
00045 
00046         var wrapper = jQuery(form).parents('div#ajax_comments_wrapper'),
00047             commentlist = jQuery('.commentlist', wrapper),
00048             new_wrapper = jQuery(data.comments_template),
00049             new_comment = jQuery('#comment-'+ data.comment_ID +', .commentlist *:last', new_wrapper).eq(0).hide();
00050 
00051         if (data.comment_type == 'conventional' && commentlist.length > 0) {
00052           commentlist.append(new_comment); // append new comment to existing wrapper
00053           jQuery('#comments', wrapper).after(jQuery('#comments', new_wrapper)).remove(); // replace comment count element
00054         } else { // flexible
00055           var new_comment_form = jQuery('textarea[@name=comment]', new_wrapper).parents('form');
00056           if (new_comment_form.length) {
00057             new_comment_form.after(form).remove(); // replace comment form in new wrapper
00058           } else {
00059             new_wrapper.append(form); // append comment form to new wrapper
00060           }
00061           wrapper.after(new_wrapper).remove(); // replace old wrapper with new
00062         }
00063         new_comment.fadeIn('slow'); // show new comment using nice effect
00064 
00065         // WP Ajax Edit Comments compatibility
00066         if (typeof(AjaxEditComments) != 'undefined') {
00067           AjaxEditComments.init();
00068         }
00069         
00070         jQuery('textarea#comment', form).val(''); // clear comment
00071 
00072         this.cleanup();
00073       },
00074 
00075       error: function(XMLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown) {
00076         var error = '';
00077         if (typeof(XMLHttpRequest.responseText) == 'string' && XMLHttpRequest.responseText != '') {
00078           error = XMLHttpRequest.responseText;
00079         } else if (textStatus == 'timeout') {
00080           error = '<?php print htmlspecialchars(__('The server is taking too long to respond. Please try again later.')) ?>';
00081         } else {
00082           error = '<?php print htmlspecialchars(__('Unknown error while submitting your comment. Try again?')) ?>';
00083         }
00084         jQuery(form).prepend('<div class="ajax_comments_error" style="background:#d00d00;margin:1em 0;padding:.8em;color:#fff;line-height:1.3em;">'+ error +'</div>'); // display error above comment form
00085         this.cleanup();
00086       },
00087 
00088       cleanup: function() {
00089         jQuery('.ajax_comments_spinner', form).remove(); // remove the AJAX spinner
00090         jQuery('input[@type=submit]', form) // select form submit button
00091           .removeAttr('disabled') // enable it
00092           .show(); // show it
00093         ajax_comments.locked[form] = false; // unlock this form
00094       }
00095     });
00096 
00097     return false; // abort non-AJAX form submission
00098   }
00099 }
00100 
00101 // execute on document load
00102 jQuery(function() {
00103   // bind to the comment form
00104   jQuery('#commentform').bind('submit', ajax_comments.onsubmit);
00105 });
